label: Moderate unexplained weight loss (<10% of body weight)
Recurrent or chronic respiratory tract infection (RTIs, sinusitis, bronchitis, otitis media, otorrhea, pharyngitis)
Acute necrotising ulcerative stomatitis, gingivitis or periodontitis
Severe unexplained weight loss (>10% of body weight)
Unexplained anaemia (<8g/dl), and or neutropaenia (<500/mm3 – 2; <1000/mm3 - children), and or thrombocytopaenia (<50000/mm3) > 1 month
Unexplained chronic diarrhoea (> 1month for adults; >14 days for children)
Bacterial pneumonia, recurrent (>2 episodes within 1 year)
Cytomegalovirus other location (site other than liver, spleen or lymph nodes) (onset at age>1month)
Mycobacterium avium complex (MAC) or Kanasii extrapulm.
Mycobacterium extrapulm. other (excluding BCG in children)
Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma, diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (immunoblasti or centroblastic)
Recurrent severe presumed bacterial infection (excluding pneumonia)
